mapper.insert: insert into bucket (num, user_name, type, subject, content, image, likecount, withcount, hashtag, area, dday, writeday, open, with_user, like_user) values (0, #{user_name}, 'solo', #{subject}, #{content}, #{image}, 0, 0, #{hashtag}, #{area}, #{dday}, now(), #{open}, #{user_name}, #{user_name})
mapper.update: update bucket set withcount = withcount + 1, with_user = concat(with_user,',',#{user_name}) where num = #{num} and with_user not like concat('%',#{user_name},'%')
update bucket set likecount = likecount + 1, like_user = concat(like_user,',',#{user_name}) where num = #{num} and like_user not like concat('%',#{user_name},'%')
mapper.select: select with_user,writeday from bucket where num = #{num}
select * from bucket where type = 'solo' and open = 'on'
select * from bucket where type = 'with' and open = 'on'
select * from bucket where content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.update: update bucket set type = 'off' where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select * from bucket where type = 'off' and open = 'on'
select * from bucket where type = 'off' and num = #{num}
